short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live dev life on the edge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are YOU an extreme developer? Do YOU feel the Danger Zone in GitHub isn't dangerous enough? Then this extension is for YOU.

A mere mouseover of the "Delete this repository" button will trigger the immolation sequence. No more "Please type your name to confirm I understand the consequences" pussyfooting. You were born understanding the consequences.

Head to https://github.com/YOU/respository/settings to play with fire

NB: Due to Sudo mode (https://docs.github.com/en/github/authenticating-to-github/sudo-mode) there'll actually be a final failsafe requiring your password. I could make this extension ask you for it beforehand but you should never share your password with anyone. No matter, you can still scare your friends with this ðŸ˜€
